split.key: Pumas are large, cat-like animals which are found in America.
split.value: 美洲狮是一种体形似猫的大动物，产于美洲。

split.key: When reports came into London Zoo that a wild puma had been spotted forty-five miles south of London, they were not taken seriously.
split.value: 当伦敦动物园接到报告说，在伦敦以南45英里处发现一只美洲狮时，这些报告并没有受到重视。
